views.markdown:
Version 1.1.11: - Uses New DRM System! Version 1.1.10:
- Fixes an old rotation bug for iPads which could be annoying iPhone users as well.
- Goes hand in hand and prepares for further releases.
- Fixes System Daemons from not crashing!
- Fixes a rotation bug on iPhones.
- Improves The First Install System, which was introduced in 1.1.9.

This update is pretty important to make all your apps work as they are supposed to.


Version 1.1.9:
- Makes your device auto-respring after every installation to fix the "LTE/WiFi" Error. The first respring after you install or update Amalthea, will take a little big longer because it reloads to license key without having you to respring one more time.

Feel free to follow my Twitter @ijapija00 for more information and updates :)


Version 1.1.8:
- Fixes a invalid pointer causing Amalthea to crash.
- Prevents users from getting a "Broken LTE/WiFi-Message" even if the network connection is alright!


Version 1.1.7:
- Fixes A Security Bug, where Amalthea used to leak private information about your device.
- Fixes Another Security Bug which caused Amalthea to crash certain apps. All apps should now work great with Amalthea!
- Fixes Settings Linkers.
- Minor Bug Fixes...

More Features are coming soon.
Follow my Twitter for beta updates on Amalthea, also offering links to the coming updates where you can test all new features!
- Temp fix for broken drm server

- Minor Security Fix...
- Fixes Broken Amalthea Settings Linkers...
